about_the_game:
Join Snoot in an Epic, Adorable Journey Like No Other!

Prepare for the fluffiest, fastest-paced, and most Snoot-tastic adventure ever! In “A Snoot’s Adventure,” you’ll step into the floppy shoes of Snoot, the lovable creature from Snootville, as you embark on a magical quest to save the Seven Realms. With vibrant 3D platforming, high-speed paintball combat, and heartwarming acts of kindness, this game blends snoot-strategy with non-stop action!

                       

A mysterious rift has opened between Snoot’s peaceful realm and our universe. Now, Snoot must race through intergalactic realms, collecting Spirit Leaves from the legendary Tree of Life to restore harmony. Along the way, earn Gratitude Hearts for helping the quirky citizens of these realms, from shy snails to the snootily mischievous JoJo Magnifico.

                       

Key Features

Unleash Snoot’s Signature Moves:
With Snoot’s unique movement mechanics, including running, rolling, slamming, and a wide range of aerial dynamics, you’ll experience speed and momentum platforming like never before! Whether you’re jumping across fantastical landscapes or zipping past enemies, every move feels snoot-credible!

                       

Engaging Story Campaign Mode:
Delve into a captivating story campaign filled with quirky characters and heartfelt moments. Each realm presents its own challenges and unique inhabitants, requiring you to engage in acts of kindness to earn Gratitude Hearts. These hearts are crucial to unlocking new areas and abilities, all while piecing together the mystery of the rift and how to mend it.

                       

Paintball Combat & Competitive Arena Shooting:
Gear up for high-octane paintball battles in thrilling arena-style matches! Choose from a variety of Snoot-tastic weapons like the single-shot pistol, burst fire, or the unstoppable machine gun. Whether you prefer close-quarters combat with the split-fire shotgun or causing chaos with sticky bombs and mimic mines, the fast-paced gameplay will keep you on your toes. Compete in multiplayer matches for up to 16 players, engaging in exciting party games and challenges that put your skills to the test.

Create Your Own Worlds:
Unleash your creativity with the level editor! Design your own Snoot worlds or battle arenas to challenge your friends. Share your creations and experience endless adventures crafted by the community!

Customize Your Snoot:
Express your individuality by fully customising your Snoot! Change its fur length, style, facial features, and even its mood. Make your Snoot uniquely yours as you venture through the whimsical realms.

     

A World Bursting with Charm:
Explore Snootville and the Seven Realms, each teeming with whimsical characters, stunning environments, and hidden treasures. With over 750 collectibles, including elemental power-ups, short stories, and even music tracks, there’s always something new to discover.

Fast-Paced Co-op:
Grab a friend (or Snoot buddy) and dive into local co-op mode! Whether it’s racing through levels or tag-teaming in paintball arenas, co-op brings double the fun to every snoot-filled adventure!

A Nostalgic Collectathon:
Inspired by classic ‘90s platformers, “A Snoot’s Adventure” is packed with the thrill of discovery and exploration. From unlocking trophies to outsmarting mini-bots, this game is a love letter to collectathon fans.

Acts of Kindness Matter:
Along your journey, every act of kindness earns you Gratitude Hearts. These will help Snoot save the realms and bring peace back to Snootville. So, go ahead—snoot your way to a brighter future!

A Snoot for Everyone!

Whether you’re a speed-runner, a family gamer, or a nostalgic fan of the platforming days, “A Snoot’s Adventure” offers something for everyone. From heartwarming adventures to fast-paced paintball battles, every moment in Snoot’s world is packed with excitement and snoot-worthy surprises.

So what are you waiting for? Snoot up, gear up, and embark on the adventure of a lifetime!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R9 270
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan-supported graphics card is highly recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 (Latest proprietary drivers) - Unity Graphics API: Vulkan / OpenGL
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: ALSA-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan API highly recommended for smooth gameplay

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina)
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 integrated / Intel Iris Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Runs well on M1 through Rosetta - Unity Graphics API: Metal
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 (Big Sur)
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 integrated graphics or AMD Radeon Pro 5700
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Native M1 support via Unity Graphics API: Metal

name: A Snoot's Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for lower-end systems at 720p @ 30fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 1080p @ 60fps

short_description: Join Snoot in “A Snoot’s Adventure!” Race through vibrant realms, collect Spirit Leaves, and restore harmony. Enter paintball combat in the Snootastic Battle Arena and challenge friends in online multiplayer. Customize your Snoot and find every spirit leaf. Adventure awaits!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
